<p>
  The first section of this survey is a visual preference survey. Please look at the images and for each one let us know if you really like it, would consider it, don't like it, or don't know if it would be a good fit for El Dorado Hills. Please consider these images generally-we are interested in whether you think the type of experience, activity or space represented by the photo would be a good addition to the park system in El Dorado Hills.</p>


```{r, cache=TRUE}
summary(data)
```
## Question 1
<p>
  Do you think this approach to landscaping, including native non-manicured plants, would be a good addition to the park system in El Dorado Hills?</p>
<p>
	<img alt="Landscaping" src="http://www.migcom.com/files/managed/Document/659/Picture1.jpg" /></p>

```{r, echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}

table(data$q1)
```
